mapper.select: select * from tb_user where username = #{username} and password=#{password}
select r.rname from tb_role r, tb_user u, tb_user_role ur where r.rid = ur.rid and u.uid= ur.uid and u.username = #{username};

select p.pname from tb_role r, tb_user u, tb_user_role ur, tb_permisson p, tb_role_permisson rp where r.rid = ur.rid and u.uid= ur.uid and p.pid = rp.pid and r.rid = rp.rid and u.username = #{username};
